PageTitle: peer enable (BGP-IPv4 multicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The peer enable command enables an MBGP device to exchange routes with a specified multicast peer.
The undo peer enable command disables an MBGP device from exchanging routes with a specified multicast peer.
By default, an MBGP device is disabled from exchanging routes with a multicast peer.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of an MBGP peer.
The address is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the peer enable command is run on an MBGP device, the MBGP device establishes an MBGP connection with a specified peer or peer group.
